mapper.insert: insert into wms_bt_client_report ( seq, order_channel_id, order_number, order_type, document_id, cust_account, reason_code, invent_site_id, invent_location_id, shipping_date_requested, source_order_id, item_id, `size`, qty, sales_price, sales_unit, line_amount, transcost, ediscount, created, creater, modified, modifier ) values ${values}
